import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; import { FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaLinkedin, FaInstagram } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Header = ({ user, setUser }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); setUser(null); navigate('/'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }; const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; const linkVariants = { hover: { scale: 1.05, color: '#10B981', transition: { duration: 0.2 } }, tap: { scale: 0.95 }, }; const iconVariants = { hover: { scale: 1.2, rotate: 10, transition: { duration: 0.2 } }, tap: { scale: 0.9 }, }; return ( <>
{/* Logo */} TalentHub {/* Desktop Navigation */}
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

Home Jobs About Us Contact
{/* Resources */}

Resources

FAQ Blog Support
{/* User Actions */}
{user ? ( <> Hi, {user.name} {user.role === 'employer' && ( Add Job )} {user.role === 'applicant' && ( My Applications )} Logout ) : ( <> Login Register )}
{/* Social Icons */}
{/* Mobile Menu Button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */} {isMenuOpen && (
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Home setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Jobs setIsMenuOpen(false)} > About Us setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Contact
{/* Resources */}

Resources

setIsMenuOpen(false)} > FAQ setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Blog setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Support
{/* User Actions */}
{user ? ( <> Hi, {user.name} {user.role === 'employer' && ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Add Job )} {user.role === 'applicant' && ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > My Applications )} Logout ) : ( <> setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Login setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Register )}
{/* Social Icons */}
)}
); }; export default Header;
